# Used to enable Updatebot for python packages. The format of the file is:
#
# package_name
#   bugzilla:
#     product: Bugzilla Product # Required
#     component: Bugzilla Component # Required
#   updatebot:
#     maintainer-bz: assignee's@bugzilla.address # Required
#     maintainer-phab: assignees_phab_name # Required
#     tasks # Required
#       - type: vendoring # Required
#         cc: ["bob@example.com"] # CC's for filed bugs, Optional
#         needinfo: ["bob@example.com"] # When a NI is assigned, assign it to maintainer-bz and these addresses, Optional
#         enabled: True # Required
#         frequency: 2 weeks # Frequency Updatebot should attempt to vendor and file bugs, Optional
#                            #   Choices are:  - 'commit' meaning every new upstream version (Default)
#                                              - 'release' meaning at most once per Firefox release
#                                              - 'X weeks' meaning at most once every X weeks, X >= 1

glean_parser:
  bugzilla:
    product: Toolkit
    component: Telemetry
  updatebot:
    maintainer-bz: tom@mozilla.com
    maintainer-phab: tjr
    tasks:
      - type: vendoring
        enabled: True
        cc: ["chutten@mozilla.com"]
